system.name: Cool Conduct Rank 1
system.effect:
Your Pokémon with at least 3d6 in their Cool Stat from Poffins may activate Cool Conduct as a Standard Action to perform one of the following Moves. They must still follow frequency limits as usual for these Moves.
Rank 1: Focus Energy, Noble Roar
system.prerequisites: Style Expert, Cool as Chosen Stat, Novice Command
